thread.title: Hilarious photos of people having huge lapses in judgement
thread.title_full: Hilarious photos of people having huge lapses in judgement

title: Hilarious photos of people having huge lapses in judgement
text: Share 77 shares Perhaps this woman was just very bored on the day she decided to shake things up by switching her dog-toddler apparatus There are no pros and a whole lots of cons when it comes to this variation on supermarket parking Whatever the right way to fiddle with a power line is, we're pretty sure this is not it Two renegades with an apparent disregard for heights, one teetering on the edge of a building, left, and the other on a subway train, right Was this passenger perhaps using earplugs to ward off a bad smell? Because we're failing to conjure up a better theory There's lazy, then there's using a box containing a chair - as a chair This woman may have a good reason for turning her umbrella on its head, but we're struggling to imagine what it might be Under no circumstances is jabbing your leg into a tree shredder a good idea, but he's going for it anyway So many questions, not least how this plane passenger found themselves in such a compromising position, and why the behaviour seems to be going unchecked Lifting extremely heavy weights while balancing precariously on a rubber ball. What could possibly go wrong? Surely, surely this is a joke, because it would be very hard indeed to confuse a thermometer with a pregnancy test This owner probably didn't invest in a harness for his cat with the intention of walking it up a tree Not where you find yourself on a surfing expedition - upside down and flailing in the ocean All they wanted was a nice souvenir snap of themselves swearing at the camera. Too bad they were facing in the wrong direction Bonkers or ingenious? Perhaps just the laziest lawn-mowing hack we've ever seen... Share or comment on this article 77
